text: Mayete vas vydatnyy tsey khto muchytesʹ z hypocrisy, ta yak vony skazaly yikhnim kompanyonam u disbelief sered lyudey svyatoho pysannya, "Yakshcho vy evicted my vyydemo z vamy, ta nikoly ne pidkorymosʹ budʹ khto khto protystavlyaye vas. Yakshcho budʹ khto biy vy, my budemo borotysʹ na vashiy storoni." BOH daye svidchennya shcho vony brekhuny
